name: Nuke-Nin
description:
You are Fugitive Ninja.

Run for survival.

Steam Workshop

---------------------------------

Playing Tips

  • When you advance 10blocks without stop, Begin nonstop mode.
  • During nonstop mode, pursuiter neither enter screen nor throw shuriken.
  • When you stop advancing, pursuiter catch up to you.
  • When you missed interceptor to out of screen, they call pursuiter.
  • When your katana hitted enemy, It cooldown is refresh immediately.
  • Your katana can repel enemy shuriken.
  • Your shuriken there can be only one in screen.
